column4: Hey guys, is it possible to have a central update distribution server for Jauny 9.04?  We have about 20 machines running 9.04
yes it is possible though i have not done it myself
would be cool, would def help ease bandwidth usage.
effectively you'd need a local store syncded with a primary location and point apt-get to only get its updates from you local store on all your local workstations
